entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE Warnings not reported with 9.0.101 #110673
  • Add CI support for testing APX #110672
    10.0.0
  • Return the matching search value in a multi-string search (i.e. IndexOfAny with SearchValues<string>) #110670
    Future
  • dotnet-sdk, version 9.0.101 fails with CMake 3.31.2 #110664
  • [mono] interpreter doesn't extend smaller integer values to register size upon return for arm64 #110649
  • interpreter causes crash when using GKMeshGraph #110644
  • System.Diagnostics.Process.Tests failure on net10.0-linux-Debug-arm64-Mono_Minijit_Debug #110643
  • JIT: Physical promotion enhancements #110642
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_RustLang_Sherlock Regressions on 12/6/2024 6:16:01 PM #110661
  • Legacy timezones not compatible with new distros -- UtcAliases_MapToUtc #110640
  • Legacy timezones not compatible with new distros -- TimeZoneInfoTests.UsingAlternativeTimeZoneIdsTest #110639
  • Legacy timezones not compatible with new distros -- TimeZoneInfo_DisplayNameStartsWithOffset #110638
  • Legacy timezones not compatible with new distros -- TimeZoneDisplayNames_Unix #110637
  • Legacy timezones not compatible with new distros -- BinaryFormatter_RoundTrips #110636
  • Json source generation do not support custom JsonConverter on the key of a Dictionary #110634

Closed

  • Assertion Failure: ``assert (n < gc_heap::n_heaps)`` #106898
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Simpler, neater and more memorable contextual logging #110646
    Future
  • Blazor WASM applications crash on startup on iOS 16.4-16.6 when built with AOT & referencing certain dependencies #105912
    10.0.0
  • varargs and __arglist on different platforms #82081
    Future
  • ToFrozenDictionary() does not adopt the IEqualityComparer of the source dictionary. #110660
  • Blazorwasm : deployment with aot compilation and with out aot compilation #66287
    10.0.0
  • .NET 8 WebAssembly AOT not generating trampoline functions #97906
    10.0.0
  • [wasm] Marshaling bool within struct with [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.U1)] throws System.InvalidProgramException #107546
    10.0.0
  • MonoVM runtime size-reduction for WebAssembly #43778
    10.0.0
  • [wasm] Custom compression pass for wasm #49222
    Future
  • [workloads] Add downlevel version check for workload versions #81310
    10.0.0
  • [PERF] Regressions in WASM AOT x64 in Logging.Formatting and IndexOf #92163
    10.0.0
  • [wasm] WBT does not use locally built ILLink.Tasks #93789
    10.0.0
  • [wasm] `LowLevelPerf.GenericGenericMethod` failing #91742
    10.0.0
  • [wasm] broad regressions in vector performance under interpreter #99554
    10.0.0
  • [mono][perf] WASM disk size regression on 21 Nov 2022 #79599
    10.0.0
  • [SIMD] Blazor Web App will not load webassembly component on virtualized machines with Chromium browser #103072
    10.0.0
  • fgReplacePred will attempt to remove Preds that do not exist. #8732
    Future
  • Document wasm relinking functionality #48349
    Future
  • RyuJIT: Add unreachable code removal pass #7974
    Future
  • Blazor WASM applications on net8.0 freeze on startup on iOS 18 RC (22A3354) when built with AOT #105893
    10.0.0
  • Implement forward substitution utility to create larger trees for morph #6973
    Future
  • JSSignatureContext.cs may include incorrect use of Math.Abs #84996
    10.0.0
  • Mono runtime unable to set callspec and utilize them #110601
    10.0.0
  • Add support for specifying DOTNET_DiagnosticPortDefaultPrefix #110473
    10.0.0
  • [RyuJIT][Linux][Inliner] In-lining heuristic needs to be tuned for Linux ABI #5615
    Future
  • localloc tests fail with InvalidProgramException #4855
    Future
  • Performance oddity: Vector3 * Matrix3 slower than Vector4 * Matrix4 #4543
    Future
  • System.Formats.Nrbf.Tests timeouts #110285
    10.0.0
  • RyuJIT call optimization and aggressive inlining with known generic types #4489
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete .GuardCF library build #110671
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add bench output log, to the file and to the console #110669
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] [Profiler] Avoid Recursive ThreadStoreLock in Profiling Thread Enumerator #110665
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Improve codegen for ExtractMostSignificatBits #110662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Avoid remorphing general `gtFoldExpr` return #110658
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Repair profile after tail-merging #110656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix base type marking for DAM annotated classes #110655
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [WASI] bump WASI SDK to v25.0 #110654
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix crash when pTargetMD is null #110652
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix crash when pTargetMD is null #110651
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Added check of RequiresValidationContext before calling IsValid #110647
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, community-contribution
  • [browser] Speed up `WasmBuildTests` by using the compression switch #110645
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Use IRootFunctions in Tensor.StdDev #110641
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix typos #110632
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Correct arm64 SignExtension #110635
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [cdac] Always re-read global pointers in `GetUsefulGlobals` #110633
    enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • More WriteGather fixes #109826
    area-System.IO, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Fix reporting of tier name metadata #110610
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix crash when pTargetMD is null #110650
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove `VisitLoopBlocksLexical` utility #110490
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] fix code gen overflow - reapply #110606
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • SPMI: Avoid duplicate example diffs in diffs summary #110619
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono]: Fix Mono profiler EventPipe provider instrumentation feature. #110618
    area-Tracing-mono
  • [Mono]: Update Mono diagnostic docs. #110621
    area-Tracing-mono
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use static project from assets or `dotnet new`, unification of browser tests #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • release/9.0-staging -- Update Alpine, Debian, and Fedora versions #110493
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 9.0.x
  • release/8.0-staging -- Update Alpine and Fedora versions #110492
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.x
  • [NRBF] skip the most time-consuming test case for non-Release builds to avoid timeouts for checked builds #110550
    area-System.Formats.Nrbf, 10.0.0

Updated

  • Beginnings of native Android build #110471
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android
  • Support disabling event tracing #110622
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Avoid all compiler optimization on embedded apphost hash #110554
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add an "init BB" invariant #110404
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cDAC] Implement GCCover portion of SOSDacImpl::GetMethodDescData #110322
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Use managed signer for bundles #110417
    area-HostModel
  • [wasm] Add wa-info tool to src/mono/wasm/tools #110565
    NO-SQUASH, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/9.0-staging][wasm] Workaround incorrect mono restore when building WBT #110590
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix few RandomAccess.Write edge case bugs #109648
    NO-MERGE, area-System.IO, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix few RandomAccess.Write edge case bugs #109646
    NO-MERGE, area-System.IO, 9.0.x
  • [RISC-V] JIT: Fix emitInsMayWriteToGCReg #110390
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add Alpine, Debian, and Ubuntu versions #110476
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix analyzer tracking of nullable enums #110331
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/9.0-staging] Use FLS detach as thread termination notification on windows. #110629
    Servicing-consider, os-windows, area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix assertion due to remorph #110516
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Spill newarr into temp #110518
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove Helper Method Frames (HMF) from Reflection #110627
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Remove always-true `fgCanRelocateEHRegions` #110612
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] NativeAOT-LLVM support in browser-bench #110611
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [browser] Remove WASM `HybridGlobalization` from runtime code #110567
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Move arithmetic helpers to managed code #109087
    arch-arm32, arch-x86, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] JIT: Read back all replacements before statements with implicit EH control flow #109143
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.2
  • JIT: Support sign mismatches for small types in physical promotion #104953
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [no-merge][testing] Try Apple mobile platforms on iOS 18 and XCode 16.1 #110566
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 10.0.0
  • [cdac] Handle non-IL method descs in `RuntimeTypeSystem_1.GetMethodClassificationDataType` #110602
    enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2600106 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Reduce memory usage when updating ZipArchives #102704
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Added a Dynamic Event for OOM Reporting #110617
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Change RSA.LegalKeySizes for Apple platforms to return 8192 #110591
    area-System.Security
  • JIT: Push initial defs and create initial def VNs for all tracked locals #105921
    NO-MERGE, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: postdominators #109656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove HttpMetricsEnrichmentContext caching #110628
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Remove HttpMetricsEnrichmentContext caching #110626
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.x
  • Updating xarch to utilize EVEX compares and blending where possible #110342
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expose StressLog via CDAC and port StressLogAnalyzer to managed code #104999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
